definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: He drove the workers until they collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 他迫使工人們幹得一個個累趴在地。

sentences.english: Students went out of the clASsroom one by one AS soon AS the bell rang.
sentences.chinese: 下課鈴一響，學生們一個個從教室裏走出來。

sentences.english: Roll the dough into small balls.
Dough is kneaded and then molded into little cute animals by this folk artisan.
sentences.chinese: 民間藝人搓捏爲一個個可愛的小動物。

sentences.english: The children pulled a long face.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們一個個都哭喪着臉。

sentences.english: With my tongue I can feel the silencer holes we drilled into the barrel of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 我的舌頭可以舔到槍管上我們鑿出來的一個個消音孔。

sentences.english: A young men and women and rejoice, bundles bright-coloured rose itch to try.
sentences.chinese: 一個個年輕男女歡欣鼓舞，一束束鮮豔玫瑰躍躍欲試。

sentences.english: Gangu County in the streets, a common one of the stalls selling fried potato chips.
sentences.chinese: 在甘谷縣街頭，常見一個個賣油炸洋芋片的小攤。

sentences.english: All with their eyes intently fastened on the iron-clamped oaken door.
sentences.chinese: 他們一個個都緊盯着佈滿鐵釘的橡木牢門。

sentences.english: Pools of sulfuric acid are indications that deep underground there are titanic stirrings .
sentences.chinese: 一個個的硫酸池說明了在深地底下藏有著巨大能源。

sentences.english: The breeze flaunted in succession like a story with beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 紛紛飄揚的風絮如同一個個美麗的故事。

sentences.english: Yes, you heard right. She tells stories through sand.
sentences.chinese: 對了，你沒聽錯，她的確會用沙子講述一個個故事。

sentences.english: The once powerful figures have also disappeared from the scene one after another.
sentences.chinese: 那些烜赫一時的人物也一個個銷聲匿跡了。

sentences.english: You find yourself putting off creating until another day.
sentences.chinese: 你發現創造被你放到一個個的“改天”。

sentences.english: There were steps along the way, a stairway, in effect.
sentences.chinese: 石徑上有着一個個臺階，簡直就是一道階梯。
